title: Mowat: Not a lot of EM currency volatility to start the year
itunes:title: Mowat: Not a lot of EM currency volatility to start the year
description:
JPMorgan's Adrian Mowat sits down to discuss emerging markets on Bloomberg Surveillance with Tom Keene and Michael McKee.
